name: ErgoRise Standing Desk Converter
description: Height-adjustable standing desk converter with gas spring, fits on any desk. 32-inch wide.

name: LumiDesk LED Desk Lamp
description: Architect-style LED desk lamp with adjustable color temperature, USB charging port, clamp mount.

name: LumiDesk Monitor Light Bar
description: Screenbar-style monitor light with auto-dimming sensor, zero screen glare.

name: DeskTidy Cable Management Kit
description: Complete cable management set: cable tray, 20 clips, 5 velcro straps, 2 cable sleeves.

specs.includes: 1 under-desk tray, 20 adhesive clips, 5 velcro straps, 2 cable sleeves

name: DeskTidy Desktop Organizer
description: Bamboo desktop organizer with phone stand, pen holder, 3 compartments, and drawer.

name: ErgoRise Monitor Arm
description: Gas spring single monitor arm for 17-32" displays, full range of motion, cable management.

name: ErgoRise Dual Monitor Arm
description: Heavy-duty dual monitor arm supporting two 27" displays, independent adjustment.

name: ComfortZone Ergonomic Footrest
description: Adjustable under-desk footrest with massage surface, 20-degree tilt range.

name: ComfortZone Gel Wrist Rest Keyboard
description: Full-size keyboard wrist rest with cooling gel pad and memory foam base.

name: ComfortZone Gel Wrist Rest Mouse
description: Mouse wrist rest with ergonomic gel cushion, non-slip rubber base.

name: FreshAir Desktop Air Purifier
description: Compact desktop HEPA air purifier for personal workspace, whisper-quiet operation.

name: LumiDesk Smart Ambient Light Strip
description: RGBWW LED strip for desk back-lighting, app-controlled, sync with screen content.

name: DeskTidy Magnetic Whiteboard
description: Frameless magnetic glass whiteboard for wall or desktop use, 24x18 inches.

name: ErgoRise Laptop Stand
description: Aluminum laptop stand with ventilation, adjustable height, fits 10-17" laptops.

name: SoundScape White Noise Machine
description: Desktop white noise machine with 30 soundscapes, timer, compact design.

name: PlantLife Desktop Succulent Planter
description: Set of 3 modern geometric concrete planters with bamboo tray, includes drainage.

name: ChargePad 3-in-1 Wireless Charger
description: Wireless charging station for phone, earbuds, and watch simultaneously.

name: ErgoRise Keyboard Tray
description: Under-desk keyboard tray with mouse platform, smooth glide rails, tilt adjustment.

name: DeskTidy File Sorter
description: Metal mesh 5-tier vertical file sorter with label holders, matte black finish.

name: ComfortZone Anti-Fatigue Mat
description: Standing desk anti-fatigue mat with contoured design, beveled edges, 20x34 inches.
